players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana was killed on the first night, which means one of us three remaining is the mafioso. We need to think carefully about who to vote for."
Charlie: "I think we should discuss Bob's behavior. He hasn't said much yet."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso—I investigated him last night and confirmed it. We must vote him out now."
Bob: "I stand by my investigation—Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote him out to protect the town."
You: "Bob, if you're really the detective, why didn't you share your investigation results in your first message? That seems like critical information to hold back."
Charlie: "Bob, your accusation seems suspicious. Alice is right; why didn't you speak up earlier?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Diana was killed on the first night, which means one of us three remaining is the mafioso. We need to think carefully about who to vote for."
Charlie: "I think we should discuss Bob's behavior. He hasn't said much yet."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso—I investigated him last night and confirmed it. We must vote him out now."
You: "I stand by my investigation—Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote him out to protect the town."
Alice: "Bob, if you're really the detective, why didn't you share your investigation results in your first message? That seems like critical information to hold back."
Charlie: "Bob, your accusation seems suspicious. Alice is right; why didn't you speak up earlier?"
